title: b'Web Developer'
job description:
b"Mission

The Databricks marketing website is our single most important external communication tool. Databricks is looking for a knowledgeable, savvy Web Developer to join the Marketing Team and support all online initiatives. In this role, you will drive all aspects of maintaining and building out the main marketing website and other Databricks web properties, with an eye toward improving the web experience, and a strong comfort level with testing to improve web performance. You will also collaborate with the entire marketing team in the creation and implementation of web content such as landing pages, blog posts, website edits, press, and email marketing.

Outcomes

Build And Maintain Databricks' Web Properties
Create new pages, drive consolidation & migration efforts of other existing Databricks properties
Apply security and plugin updates
Regularly refactor and apply performance updates
Troubleshooting and tracking issues, logging bugs, and collaborating with team to define key site changes

Drive web performance
Work across different internal stakeholder groups and SEO agency to implement tactics to grow site traffic
Plan and execute A/B tests to optimize for conversions
Understands design to help improve the user experience on the site
Track and report web metrics and provide insights to the team into site performance

Staging and publishing web content
Create pages in WordPress
Ensures pages are SEO optimized
Staging and publishing of content - Blog posts, press releases, etc.

Competencies
Extensive knowledge of WordPress CMS and theme/plugin development
Strong front-end development background (HTML, JavaScript and CSS)
Knowledge of Google Analytics and Google Tag Manager
Background developing landing pages and executing A/B tests
Experience working with git version control software
Able to self-manage projects and can provide input on new projects
Strong analytical skills to deliver insights to improve performance
Able to perform under pressure and deliver results in a demanding and fast-paced environment that requires fresh thinking and innovation
Works and communicates well with stakeholders across multiple groups


Benefits
Medical, dental, vision
401k Retirement Plan
Unlimited Paid Time Off
Catered lunch (everyday), snacks, and drinks
Gym reimbursement
Employee referral bonus program
Awesome coworkers
Maternity and paternity plans


About Databricks

Databricks\xe2\x80\x99 mission is to accelerate innovation for its customers by unifying Data Science, Engineering and Business. Founded by the team who created Apache Spark\xe2\x84\xa2, Databricks provides a Unified Analytics Platform for data science teams to collaborate with data engineering and lines of business to build data products. Users achieve faster time-to-value with Databricks by creating analytic workflows that go from ETL and interactive exploration to production. The company also makes it easier for its users to focus on their data by providing a fully managed, scalable, and secure cloud infrastructure that reduces operational complexity and total cost of ownership. Databricks, venture-backed by Andreessen Horowitz, NEA and Battery Ventures, among others, has a global customer base that includes Salesforce, Viacom, Shell, and HP. For more information, visit www.databricks.com.

Apache, Apache Spark and Spark are trademarks of the Apache Software Foundation"

title: b'Frontend Web Developer'
location: b'94041, Mountain View, California, United States'
job description:
b'Job Title: Frontend Web Developer 
Location: Mountain View, CA 94041

Summary:

We are very passionate about solving real world problems in a production environment and care deeply about the customer experience.  What you will be doing:

Portal will need to communicate to the backend over REST api.

 3-5 years of experience with web application development.

Strong CSS, Javascript, React or Angular skills'

title: b'Web Developer'
job description:
b"Location: Palo Alto, CA

With more than 117 years of technology innovation, a global team of 100,000, and 64,000+ technology patents, NEC is in the business of providing solutions that focus on safety, security, operational efficiency - enabling people to live brighter, more enriched lives. We call this orchestrating a brighter world.

Summary

Provide programming and troubleshooting support for Marketing-related web activities. Must be able to design, define, evaluate and implement a range of third-party and proprietary web-based & hardware accelerator applications as well as maintain, revise and upgrade propriety web-based & hardware accelerator legacy applications and workflows. Conceptual knowledge and practical experience in the phases of web programming, maintenance, security, and development essential.

Able to collaborate with others, deliver results in a timely manner and explain best practices and concepts in a way that builds consensus and wins alliances.

Essential Duties And Responsibilities
45% Analyze, evaluate, develop, test and deploy new and existing web-based & hardware accelerator applications.
Provides detailed analysis to ensure applications meet key requirements.
Design software applications, modules and/or approaches and required enhancements for operational efficiencies.
Codes, reviews, prepare prototypes to demonstrate effectiveness.
Analyzes, recommends, validates and implements software application rebuilds and upgrades.
20% Interpret web-based marketing needs, assess requirements and identify solutions to standard and non-standard requests to establish and maintain a positive NEC brand image with customers, prospects, media and analysts, employees and the general public.
Collaborates internally/externally to determine web-based requirements and identify best practices to achieve key objectives and outcomes.
Explains issues and works to build understanding and consensus.
20% Maintains and enhances technology expertise, keeping current with evolving systems analysis, programming and database technology.
10% Produces program, system and user documentation for all systems created within the department.
5% Provides on-call support for customers 24x7.

Prerequisites
Education: Bachelor's degree in business, computer science or equivalent work experience.
Experience:
2+ years of experience in Web Development.
2+ years experience developing .net, PHP or other programming applications.
2+ years of experience with Microsoft SQL.
Familiar with CMS tools such as Autonomy Teamsite.
HTML5, CCS3, JavaScript, XML, Web Services, API.
Microsoft SQL stored procedures, views, indexes.
Familiarity with SAP.


Specialized Knowledge And Skills
Language Skills: Excellent communication skills and a demonstrated ability to effectively work with and support customers.
Mathematical Skills: Must be skilled in basic math.
Reasoning Skills: Must be able to work with limited oversight. Must be self-motivated with strong attention to detail.
Computer and/or Technical Skills: Possesses in-depth working knowledge of programming and systems analysis procedures. Is fluent in the relevant programming languages and environments. Proficient in all aspects of the software development lifecycle (including analysis, design, development, testing, implementation, and support).

Work Environment and Physical Demands
General Work Environment: Professional office environment.
Noise: Moderate.
Standing/Lifting: None.
Visual: Must be able to read small text accurately.
Stress: Medium. Must be able to work independently with limited guidance.
Travel: Moderate.
Supervisory Responsibility, if any: This position has no supervisory responsibilities.


About Nec Corporation Of America

Headquartered in Irving, Texas, NEC is a leading provider of innovative IT, biometrics, network, and communications products and solutions for service carriers and Fortune 1000 and SMB businesses across multiple vertical industries, including healthcare, government, education, and hospitality. NEC delivers one of the industry's broadest portfolios of technology solutions and professional services, including unified communications, wireless, voice and data, managed services, server and storage infrastructure, optical network systems, microwave radio communications, and biometric security. NEC is a wholly owned subsidiary of NEC Corporation, a global technology leader with a presence in over 44 countries and more than $37.5 billion in revenue. For more information, please visit www.necam.com.

NEC Corporation of America and its subsidiaries is committed to the maximum utilization of all human resources and the goal of Equal Employment Opportunity/Affirmative Action. We provide equal opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, age, marital status, disability, genetic characteristics, height, weight, arrest record pertaining to misdemeanors or status as a Vietnam era or special disabled veteran, or any other class protected by applicable federal, state or local laws.

EOE-Minorities/Females/Protected Veterans/Individuals with Disabilities."

title: b'Web Production Developer'
job description:
b'Summary

Apple Retail is seeking an experienced web production developer to join the Apple Digital Content Management team.

You are smart, self-directed, and a problem-solver. You thrive under pressure and deadlines while being at ease dealing with ambiguity and rapidly changing requirements. You have ultimate respect for pixel perfect UI implementation.

Key Qualifications

Minimum 3 years of experience in developing front-end code for large-scale websites
Solid understanding of cross-browser, cross-platform and cross-device compatibility standards and behaviors
Strong HTML and CSS skills. Experience in JavaScript, Node, DevOps and scripting languages (Ruby, PHP, Python, etc) is a plus
Experience with versions control systems, specifically Git
Knowledgeable and eager to implement current web design and development trends including HTML5, CSS3
Must be a quick study, our team uses some proprietary technologies beyond HTML & CSS
Experience and proficiency working with Photoshop and Sketch
Exhibit a high degree of ownership and accountability
Understanding of challenges behind localization of large-scale sites and its impact on web development
Strong teamwork and communication skills
Great attention to detail
Passion for creating a great user experience and interaction
Understanding of performance, web analytics, accessibility, SEO techniques
Description

Transform Photoshop mock-ups from our Design teams into HTML layouts styled with CSS to build merchandising and product marketing pages for the Apple Online Stores

Deliver front-end code to the publisher teams that integrates easily into the publishing environment

Quickly and expertly address browser compatibility issues

Work efficiently under incredibly tight timelines and meet deadlines without sacrificing quality of product and services

Work with the Engineering partners to establish and support best practices

Adept at working with content management systems and Subversion or similar file management systems

Identify and drive ways to improve production processes and quality of code deliveries

Create and maintain documentation of the development processes and workflows

Willing and able to accommodate flexible work schedules during critical business periods'

title: b'Web Developer'
job description:
b"Who We Are

Postmates enables anyone to have just about anything on-demand. We pioneered the on-demand space and currently serve 3500+ cities with a fleet of more than 350,000 Postmates and the largest network of merchants in the US. We\xe2\x80\x99re changing the landscape of commerce by making cities our warehouses, providing the delivery infrastructure, and connecting our customers to any product, anywhere, anytime. Postmates isn\xe2\x80\x99t just an app, it\xe2\x80\x99s a way of life and a part of pop culture. We are the O.G. of on-demand and we\xe2\x80\x99ve given people a new superpower \xe2\x80\x94 the ability to Postmate anything from anywhere. We\xe2\x80\x99re building a movement to make Postmates a verb: Postmate it.

What We Do

Postmates relies heavily on our engineering team to realize this vision. Building a software platform that is reliable, scales, and stays agile under demanding product needs is a serious technical challenge. Postmates is a three-part balancing act connecting customers, merchants, and couriers in real-time. If any piece is out of whack, the whole system suffers. Working with the Postmates engineering team offers an opportunity with explosive growth, cutting-edge technology, a highly visible charter, and a cool user-focused product vision.

Postmates is looking for a contract Web Developer who would primarily focus on our SEO initiatives. The role would mostly be building static/light on javascript marketing type pages. Since most of our tooling and apps are written in React though, it is important to have some familiarity with React.
OUR TECHNOLOGIES
Client: Typescript, React, Redux, Emotion
Server: Go, Python, Node
Platform: AWS, Google
YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES
Build and launch consumer-facing features to millions of customers
Tune and polish features to a high-degree of excellence
Work closely with the design and product team to iterate on UI/UX
Relentlessly optimize the web experience of buying with Postmates
OUR REQUIREMENTS
Minimum of 2 years of experience working with web technologies and a passion for UX
Minimum of 2 years of experience working with a modern web framework like React or Angular
A deep understanding of the fundamentals of the web (REST, JS, HTML, CSS)
Strong knowledge of algorithms and data structures
Bachelor's degree (or equivalent experience) required
OUR PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS
You\xe2\x80\x99re a self-starter and strong finisher
You\xe2\x80\x99ve worked at or started a small company where you had to wear many hats
You write well and communicate clearly
You prefer problems over tasks"

title: b'Web Developer'
job description:
b"TL;DR

High-impact software development jobs for smart people.

Code that saves lives.

As a software developer at Epic, you\xe2\x80\x99ll write software that impacts the lives of 75% of Americans and 250 million patients around the world. Working in your own office, surrounded by thousands of high-caliber developers, you\xe2\x80\x99ll use modern development methodologies and employ user-centered design, analytics, and machine learning tools to drive innovation in healthcare. Using leading-edge technologies and languages like JS, TS, and C#, you\xe2\x80\x99ll invent better ways to reduce medical errors, streamline record sharing between hospitals, and provide the quality of care a patient deserves.

Write software for the most innovative health systems on the planet.

All the Top 20 health systems in U.S. News and World Report are Epic customers. Our community includes major systems like the Mayo Clinic, Johns Hopkins, Cleveland Clinic, and Kaiser Permanente, as well as leading academic medical centers at the University of Wisconsin, University of Michigan, University of California, University of Texas, The Ohio State University, and many more.

Work in your own office, eat delicious food, and travel the world.

We don\xe2\x80\x99t believe in cubicles. (Well, we believe they exist, but\xe2\x80\xa6) You will work in an individual office that will heighten your ability to get stuff done. For lunch, visit King\xe2\x80\x99s Cross or Cassiopeia for a wide array of meal options, or go to one of our smaller, themed bistros, featuring wood-rotisserie, pan-Asian, and Latin-inspired cuisine. All meals are restaurant-quality but cost only a few dollars, and they\xe2\x80\x99re prepared by a team comprised of kitchen talent from restaurants around the country. And, after five years here, you\xe2\x80\x99ll earn a four-week sabbatical anywhere in the world. Staff have kayaked in Patagonia, attended a Beyonc\xc3\xa9 concert in Ireland, built a library in Tanzania, and run a marathon in Antarctica.

Live affordably in a city known for its rising tech talent.

Epic is located just outside Madison, Wisconsin the second fastest growing market for tech talent in the United States and home to the state capital and the University of Wisconsin. Madison, a city surrounded by water, has received accolades for being the greenest city in America (NerdWallet), the best city for renters (SmartAsset), fittest city in America (Fitbit), and, for the gamers, is one of a handful of US cities to have a Killer Queen arcade game, located at Madison\xe2\x80\x99s first arcade bar.

More than just important work.

We offer comprehensive benefits to keep you healthy and happy as you grow in your life and career, and your merit-based compensation will reflect the impact your work has on the company and our customers. You'll also be eligible for annual raises and bonuses, as well as stock grants, which give you an even greater stake in the success of Epic and our customers. Epic is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action (W/M/Vets/Disability) employer. Please see our full non-discrimination statement at https //careers.epic.com/EEO.

Requirements

Open to relocation to the Madison, WI area (we will bring you here to explore the city for yourself)
BS/BA or greater in Computer Science, Mathematics, Software Engineering, Computer Engineering, or a related field
A history of academic excellence or professional success
Eligible to work in the United States without visa sponsorship (persons with appropriate qualifications and eligible for TN status under NAFTA may apply)"

title: b'Web Developer'
job description:
b'The Company: eGain customer engagement solutions deliver digital transformation for leading brands \xe2\x80\x93 powered by virtual assistance, AI, knowledge, and analytics. Our comprehensive suite of applications help clients deliver memorable, digital-first customer experiences in an omnichannel world. To find out more about eGain, visit https://www.egain.com.

We are currently looking for freelancer Web Developers to work for our Marketing team in Sunnyvale, CA.

Position: Web Developer
Expereince: 2 to 4 Years in Web development
Location: Sunnyvale, CA

Job description
The Web Developer will work on our customer facing user interface development as a part of customer deployment projects. This will involve building most sophisticated experiences for customers using eGain platform.

Responsibilities
Development of new and existing Web UI application functionality to meet the growing goals of our global customer base
Design UI / UX wireframes as well as translate them into code
Build reusable code and libraries for future use
Actively develop technical skills around new, upcoming web technologies, driving our products into the future
Drive best technology and software development practices into the team with passion and enthusiasm
Actively QA with acceptance criteria
Assist Tech. Support in supporting customer-escalated product issue and queries

Requirements
2+ year of professional experience in web development using Angular framework
Demonstrable experience of web development using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, and JavaScript frameworks
Good understanding of Web Services (e.g., RESTful services), including the ability to programmatically interact with data formats, including XML and JSON
Good understanding of one of the cloud provider such as AWS, Azure or GCP.
Good understanding of building responsive web applications.
Experience of designing well-formed user experiences through modern web technologies
Ability to write well-structured, testable, easy-to-understand code
Self-motivated, professional, enthusiastic, reliable
Ability to work well in a team, and problem-solve collaboratively


To apply:
Send your resume and cover letter in MS Word to msitania@egain.com and include the position in the subject line of the email'

title: b'Web Application Developer'
job description:
b'We are a fast-growing company with a single lofty goal: to bring personal aviation to the general public. Innovating at the leading edge of electric aviation technology, we have developed BlackFly, the world\xe2\x80\x99s first ultralight all-electric fixed-wing VTOL personal aircraft. Join us in ushering in a new age of aviation.

We are seeking someone with a passion for innovation and technology, who possesses the full-stack programming and user-interface design skills to develop internal and aircraft management tools.

Job Responsibilities
Create internal web tools to be utilized throughout the company
Develop web applications to communicate with and monitor aircraft
Program the full stack using Python/Django and Javascript/node.js/React
Construct powerful SQL queries
Develop code to communicate with external APIs
Design modern user interfaces with Google Material Design
Write scripts to perform regular sanity checks and other housekeeping duties
Learn and apply new technologies
Assist in setting up and maintaining computer environments and network, as needed
Increase the visibility of information, and efficiency and effectiveness of employees
Other programming and engineering duties, as required

Minimum Qualifications
Undergraduate or graduate degree in Software Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field
Strong understanding of Software Engineering and Computer Science fundamentals, especially web development, object-oriented programming, and databases
Programming fluency in Python, Javascript, and node.js
Experience with back end development and SQL commands
Experience with front end programming, HTML, CSS, and user interface design
Experience with REST APIs
Comfortable with Linux and script writing
Able to write in a clear and concise manner

Optional Qualifications
Familiarity with Django, Flask, or similar Python-based web framework
Familiarity with React, Angular, or similar Javascript-based web framework
Programming experience in C/C++
Experience writing unit tests
Experience with Git or other version control systems
Contribute to open source projects
Advanced Google Sheet or MS Excel skills
Interest in RC planes, quad copters, or aviation

Personal Attributes
Thrive in a fast-moving, stimulating, and collaborative team environment
Resourceful, curious, and never satisfied with the status quo
Strong work ethic, extremely organized, detail-oriented, and able to multitask
Always thinking about how to increase efficiency and improve processes
Proactive about solving problems and suggesting solutions
Love learning and being challenged
Applicants must be eligible to work in the United States and willing to relocate.'

title: b'Web Developer'
job description:
b"About Rippling

Rippling is the first way for businesses to manage their HR & IT \xe2\x80\x94 from payroll and benefits, to employee computers and apps \xe2\x80\x94 all in one, modern system.

In just 90-seconds, a company can set up (or disable) an employee's payroll, health insurance, work computer, and third-party apps, like Gmail, Microsoft Office, and Slack. It's the only platform that truly unifies every employee system, and automates all of the administrative work.

Rippling is HQ in San Francisco and has raised $60M in Series A funding from top-tier investors, including Kleiner Perkins, Initialized, DFJ, and Y Combinator.

About The Role

We are looking for a Web Developer to join our fast-paced team and take ownership of and set the standard for the front-end code of our website and all digital marketing assets. You must be comfortable working at the intersection of rough mockups and backend APIs, implementing interfaces in a crisp and precise way in both web and mobile. You will need to debug JavaScript, hack CSS, and have full accountability and understanding for how pages/UIs operate in the web and mobile environments.

What You'll Do
Work directly with the marketing team to develop page layouts, templates, dynamic navigations
Develop interactive user experiences
Develop animation for web and mobile web digital products


Qualifications
Fluent in JavaScript, HTML/CSS, Web API, and other UI technologies and frameworks
Knowledge of web hosting principles, server architectures, and web site security
Experience at a B2B SaaS company working with AdTech or MarTech a plus
Wordpress experience is a plus
Working knowledge of fundamental design principles that affect typography, color use, composition, use of space, and presentation of information
Back-end development experience desired, but not required
Ability in a design tool for quick mockups (preferably Photoshop, Illustrator, Sketch) a plus


Benefits
Medical, Dental, Vision, FSA, HSA, Commuter, Life and Disability Benefits
Uncapped PTO
Meeting-light culture
Onsite meals
Competitive compensation (salary, equity)


Rippling is an equal opportunity employer."

title: b'Web Developer (Contract Position)'
job description:
b'Web Developer (Contract Position)

Five9 is a 250 million dollar leader in cloud based contact center solutions and one of the Bay Area\xe2\x80\x99s fastest growing companies. Since 2001, Five9 has led the cloud revolution in contact centers, helping organizations transition from legacy premise-based solutions to the cloud. Five9 provides businesses with cloud contact center software that is reliable, secure, compliant and scalable, which is designed to create exceptional customer experiences, increase agent productivity and deliver tangible business results.

The Five9 Digital Marketing team is looking for a contract Web Developer (mid-level) to join us in shaping the future Five9.com and taking our digital presence to another level.

The Web Producer is responsible for the development, production, and maintenance of Five9.com webpages. In collaboration with the Marketing team, the Web Producer will support the strategic plan and development of the Five9.com website, and contribute to the day-to-day production of content for the website.

This position is not remote and will require someone to be in our San Francisco office. This is a 3 month contract.

What your day-to-day responsibilities look like:

Build out web pages and landing pages while coordinating with the marketing team for images, copy, creative, and content page attributes.
Execute QA (quality assurance) and QC (quality control) of webpages to ensure the content is coherent and accurate.
Review content edits and requests from stakeholders in a timely fashion, and publish as appropriate.
Work with a highly collaborative, engaged, and effective group.
Help explore innovative, relevant, and highly effective digital experiences and solutions for site enhancements to improve the customer experience.

What are the skills we\xe2\x80\x99re looking for?

5+ years related experience developing semantically correct HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Experience in creating landing pages, content web pages.
Strong interpersonal and communication skills.
Familiarity with website best practices in web development to protect secure information.
Familiarity in responsive design for mobile-compatible websites and tools.
Strong writing and editing skills.
Must be a self-starter, highly motivated, awesome organizational skills, with the ability to turn on a dime, think through problems to come up with innovative solutions and deliver against very tight deadlines while keeping a keen eye on detail and accuracy. Energetic, resourceful, driven, creative.
A plus, familiarity with content management systems (CMS) like Crownpeak.
A plus, you have worked closely and have a general understanding of information architecture, user experience, interaction design, visual design initiatives.
Degree in Design, Art, CS or proven equivalent.

What\xe2\x80\x99s the team like?

Small but mighty! We\xe2\x80\x99re a collaborative, thoughtful, and experienced digital marketing team within a fast paced culture. Always learning, communicating, and having fun along the way.'

title: b'Front End Developer'
job description:
b'As a Front-end developer within the Human Interaction Engineering (HIE) team, you will work closely with UI designers, graphic designers, software engineers and QA engineers for creating interactive web applications using a range of technologies (like HTML5, JavaScript, ReactJS, CSS, XML/JSON). 

Duties & Responsibilities
Play a critical role in defining the web UI architecture for enterprise products
Take complete ownership of developing cross-browser compatible interactive user interfaces for our web-applications using XHTML/CSS, JavaScript, and AJAX
Work with product marketing team in translating marketing requirements into innovative design.
Partner with product development teams to establish appropriate data-exchange APIs (Restful) and communication protocols
Connect with the user interface development community to track latest trends and emerging technologies
As part of the product design team you shall also at times support rapid prototyping needs, this involves cutting corners while generating interactive UI for quick concept demonstration

Qualifications/Requirements
Expert knowledge in Object Oriented JavaScript programming and CSS
Relevant Web development experience using JavaScript/HTML5/CSS/AJAX/XML/JSON
Strong experience with JavaScript and CSS libraries and frameworks such as React and Bootstrap \xe2\x80\x93 including in-depth knowledge of DOM, cross-browser support, and customization
Experience in using and customizing JavaScript libraries and writing efficient and reusable UI code
Proficient in developing CSS-driven UI layouts
Strong understanding of web standards, protocols, and cross-browser compatibility issues
Experience in version one product design a big plus
Excellent communication and teamwork skills
BS/MS in Computer Science or related technical field
3+ years of web UI development experience

Other:
A portfolio of previous work is required for consideration

Trend Micro provides equal employment opportunity for all applicants and employees. Trend Micro does not unlawfully discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, pregnancy and childbirth or related medical conditions, national origin, ancestry, age, physical or mental disability, medical condition, family care leave status, veteran status, marital status, sexual orientation, or gender identity.'

title: b'Front End Web Developer'
job description:
b'Description:

Our client is based in Mountain View but is open to a few days a week work from home.

They are developing magical experiences for a well-known and beloved global brand with hundreds of millions of users. We have an opening for a talented and creative front-end developer who is excited to push the envelope of consumer web applications, ready to add engaging features to our flagship experience.

Responsibilities:
Participate in the full development lifecycle, including ownership of design and architectural decisions, coding, and production releases
Design and develop software following best practices and using modern technologies
Work collaboratively with people across different teams to deliver feature-rich projects
Participate in design and code reviews
Research and implement new web technologies
Advocate for code quality and high coding standards

Requirements:
3+ years of experience developing modern, responsive, web applications
Experience developing visually-compelling consumer and/or social applications
Experience building full-stack applications and deep understanding of related technologies
Solid understanding of best practices for building cross-browser and cross-platform applications and the constraints of web technologies
Expert in JavaScript (ES6+), HTML5, CSS3
Understanding of JavaScript preprocessing and module bundlers such as Webpack
Has built non-trivial apps in React and Redux
Experience working with NodeJS and Express applications
Passionate about developing amazing user experiences
Track record of being adventurous and creative in life
Experience with the Agile development methodology is a plus
Experience with Git and CLI tools
Computer Science or equivalent (or equivalent) is preferred
Bonus points for wireframing & interaction design skills
Bonus points for hands on web design skills
Bonus points for experience working with 3D graphics or augmented reality applications

Benefits:
Ability to develop amazing experiences for hundreds of millions of users
Opportunity to work in a dynamic R&D team of software developers, computer vision, AI, computational photography, AR, and graphics professionals.
Excellent health & retirement benefits.'

title: b'Full Stack Web Developer'
job description:
b'Must have Technical Skills and experience required Development .NET development experience

Front end UI development using Javascript Frameworks (ex. reactjs, ember)

Nodejs development experience Rest API development and integration

SOAP service development and integration

Architecture Modeling and Process UML Data modeling, profiling and analysis Security SSO Standards (SAML 2.0, OAuth 2.0)

Performance, Monitoring and Web Analytics Adobe web analytics experience Tealium andor Google Tag Manager experience Marketing Systems Experience Marketing automation implementation Marketing analytics experience

Job responsibilities To deliver integrated solutions to enable Digital Lead Acquisition initiatives.

Perform this by creating acceptance test cases with business partners, configuring systems andor developing custom modules to complete the program, creating documentation for on-going operation needs future maintenance, and handing over program to business partners.

Development work will be completed in Microsoft (ASP .NET, C, MVC, REST API, etc) and front-end (HTML5, JavaScript, jQuery, Ajax, CSS, etc) technology stack.

Both front-end and back-end unit tests are required as part of delivery. Take ownership and perform as the subject matter expert on delivered solutions.

Inclusive of this is gathering a deep understanding of implementation strategy for system(s) involved, how to configure system features capabilities, business users use cases, processes supported by the system(s), and integration points specs with updownstream systems. Support delivered solutions through hand-over sessions with business, triage calls during incidents, and answering on-going clarification questions regarding implementation. Build critical working relationships with the business and users communities through gathering a thorough understanding of the business models and processes employed. Specify and fully document application customization that would bear scrutiny by an internal audit or external regulators'

title: b'Web Developer'
job description:
b'Job Description

OSIsoft is looking for a Web Developer to join our Global Digital Demand Generation/Marketing Group. This position requires a versatile technical individual with proven expertise in developing and maintaining public facing websites. This role will be responsible for development and implementation of a premium user experience on osisoft.com and associated online interactions. This position will be charged with design and implementation of pages and templates that power our web content management system (CMS). This position will work on changes and simple enhancements as well as large projects that add significant, new functionality to our corporate website. In addition, this position will consult and contribute to development execution for other areas of marketing technologies as needed.

Responsibilities
Be a part of the core team that collaborates to design and build a premium user experience for users of osisoft.com
Lead improvement efforts in website development processes, including code management, release planning, and testing best practices
Maintain and extend strong relationships with IT Business Partners and service provider teams
Utilize proven skills and knowledge, to provide troubleshooting and timely resolution of application and performance issues
End-to-end CMS administration and management
Working knowledge of website analytics and optimization tools, including A/B testing and Google Analytics
Consult and contribute technically for other areas of marketing as needed
Proficient at turning wireframes and mockups into HTML / CSS with a working knowledge of Photoshop, Adobe XD, Sketch and Illustrator
A self-motivated team player possessing excellent communication and analytic skills

Qualifications
Bachelors degree in Computer Science, MIS or equivalent experience
3-5 years experience in web development and web management
Knowledge of generic webmaster duties including troubleshooting, backup and documentation
Experienced supporting and scaling public-facing web or application development environments
Understands responsive design and how it applies to clean code, CSS, and graceful degradation/progressive enhancement
Expertise with CMS systems like Episerver, Drupal, Wordpress
Experience with both on-prem and cloud hosting
Server-side programming experience and applicable skills in Java, PHP, and others
Strong knowledge of contemporary software development methodologies and best practices, including full software development lifecycle processes
Ability to work both independently and collaboratively, and manage priorities in a fast-paced environment
If applicable please include a portfolio or examples of past work (Personal Website, Project URLs, etc).
Strong background with SSL protocols / ASP.NET / Windows Internals / Tracing Tools (e.g., Fiddler, Wireshark, Netmon)
Working experience with ADO, T-SQL, .NET programming language (C#) and .NET framework APIs. (Azure) is a plus
Expertise in core web languages such as JavaScript, HTML, (S)CSS, XML, XSLT)
Strong background in front end development including HTML, CSS, Javascript and modern libraries such as React, Angular, etc
Proficient in backend development, preferably C# or VB.NET (or some other compiled language)
Experience with SQL and relational database

About OSIsoft

OSIsoft is a global leader in operational intelligence. We deliver an open enterprise infrastructure, the PI System\xe2\x84\xa2, to connect sensor-based data, systems and people. OSIsoft has installations in 127 countries and is widely used across manufacturing, energy, utilities, pharmaceuticals, life sciences, data centers, facilities and the process industries, as well as the public sector and the federal government. OSIsoft is headquartered in San Leandro, California, U.S.A, with offices around the world.

At OSIsoft, we provide the industry standard in enterprise infrastructure for management of time series data through the OSIsoft PI System\xe2\x84\xa2. Our customers rely upon the PI System\xe2\x84\xa2 to safeguard data and deliver enterprise-wide visibility into operational, manufacturing and business information. The PI System\xe2\x84\xa2 enables users to manage assets, mitigate risks, comply with regulations, improve processes, drive innovation, make business decisions in real time, and to identify competitive business and market opportunities. We are time series data; if the data has a value at a given time, we collect it, store it, and show it to our customers whenever they need it! We let engineers and managers see exactly what\xe2\x80\x99s going on in their processes in real time \xe2\x80\x93 useful, right?

OSIsoft is an equal opportunity employer and is an affirmative action employer. Adhering to our tenets, we are pathfinders, we are honest, and we respect people: our customers, partners, and especially our employees. We are committed to an inclusive workplace and accept applications without regard to race, religious creed, color, age, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression or gender characteristic, national origin, religion, marital status, medical condition, physical or mental disability, military service or veteran status, pregnancy, childbirth and related medical conditions, or any other classification protected by federal, state, and local laws and ordinances. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know.'

title: b'Web Developer'
job description:
b'The Opportunity
Simply stated, Livongo exists to empower people with chronic conditions to live better and healthier lives. This is your chance to help shape Livongo\xe2\x80\x99s web framework during a time of astronomical growth and product expansion.
What makes a Web Developer at Livongo different?
It is engineering! you\xe2\x80\x99ll see your ingenuity put to good use as you build complex web applications from concept through execution, impacting everything from the home page to layout and functionality
Your experience in online strategies, technologies coding, and innovative design will strengthen Livongo\xe2\x80\x99s brand and reach
Your day to day is driven by defining site objectives by analyzing user requirements and envisioning optimal system features and functionality
Gathering and refining specifications based on content, functional and technical needs
Collaborating with web designers to deliver stunning visual design
Learning and maintaining a deep familiarity with emerging technologies and industry trends and apply them in your work
Candidate Profile
5+ years\xe2\x80\x99 experience in web programming, with outstanding skills
In-depth knowledge of modern HTML/CSS
The ability to develop and deliver a variety of web applications
Experience with one or more of the common JS frameworks: ReactJS, Angular, AngularJS, JQuery, Prototype
A deep understanding of REST and/or gRPC
Knowledge of relational database systems, Object Oriented Programming, web security, and session management
Hands-on experience with network diagnostics and network analytics tools
Basic abilities in code optimization, unit testing, and data analytics
BS degree in Engineering, Computer Science or a related field. In lieu of a degree, relevant work experience and/or trade school is acceptable.

The nature of work is interdisciplinary, and our teammates come from varying backgrounds e.g. (Site Reliability Engineer (SRE), Systems Engineer, Software Engineer, DevOps Engineer, Infrastructure Engineer, Production Engineer). We urge you to apply even if you feel uncertain that you have the exact background.
Why Join Livongo?
The Transformative Name in Healthcare: The transformative industry forces in Community, Content and Commerce are now household names. As Amazon is to Commerce, Livongo is to Healthcare. With our Applied Health Signals engine, AI+AI, we\xe2\x80\x99ve transformed how care is delivered.

Our Work Truly Matters: Livongo\xe2\x80\x99s proprietary, consumer-first technology is revolutionizing the experience of living with a chronic health condition. Our data-driven digital health engine enables our Members to seamlessly manage multiple health conditions on one empowering platform. We use smart, connected devices, personalized digital guidance, and 24x7x365 access to health professionals to make it easier for people to stay healthier.

Make an Impact: Do you want to accomplish something meaningful? To create results that matter? Livongo\xe2\x80\x99s innovative solution produces industry-leading member satisfaction, measurable clinical outcomes and proven healthcare costs savings. Here you can truly improve lives.

The Largest Digital Health IPO in History: We are at a milestone period in our history. On July 25, 2019 we took our company public, in order to elevate and expand the way the industry views us, thus ushering us into a whole new set of mission-critical conversations that will help us accomplish the work still to be done. As we reach new levels of achievement, we accelerate our ability to deliver life-changing services.

Focus on PEOPLE: Livongo has been voted one of the Best Places to Work in healthcare, by Fortune Magazine and Best Place to Work ! Talented, passionate individuals make the difference, in this fast-moving, collaborative and inspiring environment.

Diversity and Inclusion: At Livongo we believe that personal and professional diversity is the key to innovation. We hire based solely on your strengths and qualifications, and the way in which those strengths can directly contribute to your success in your new position.

Growth and Innovation: We\xe2\x80\x99ve already made healthcare history, yet we remain on the threshold of very big things. Leading the industry with our Applied Health Signals category, we have cracked the code to transforming healthcare. Come grow with us and support our mission to make a tangible difference in the lives of our Members.

See photos, watch videos and learn more about Livongo: follow us on Glassdoor .

#LivongoIPO #appliedhealthsignals

As an Equal Opportunity Employer, we never have and never will discriminate against any job candidate or employee due to age, race, religion, color, ethnicity, national origin, gender, gender identity/expression, sexual orientation, membership in an employee organization, medical condition, family history, genetic information, veteran status, marital status, parental status or pregnancy (including breastfeeding \xe2\x80\x93 we have a mother\xe2\x80\x99s room in both our offices). In our innovative and inclusive workplace, we prohibit discrimination and harassment of any kind.'

title: b'SPA Front End Developer'
job description:
b"SPA/Vue Front End Developer

Sunnyvale, CA I Full-time position

What you'll be doing

As a Front-end Developer, you will be an integral part of the on-site team we have created with our client, the world's leading technology company. You will work with a multi-disciplinary collection of experts in their respective fields, contributing to a high-visibility project of tantamount importance to the client's marketing communications department.

What you bring to the table
A well-formatted resume that highlights your skills, experience, and attention to detail
Demonstrable expertise with developing Single Page Applications in React or Vue.js, as well as the foundational JavaScript principles that makes them work
A working knowledge of HTML and CSS (SASS or LESS) with vendor prefixes, conditionals, and media queries
Experience developing accurate markup from comps
Familiarity with Git and YAML
Excellent communication skills
Nice to haves
Agency experience
Experience (with samples) in hand-coded email that achieves cross-browser/client compliance
Understanding of varied email clients, and the idiosyncrasies they carry
Experience with testing platforms such as Litmus or EmailonAcid
Experience working with Photoshop and MacOS applications

Our Humblebrag

Join an award-winning, digitally-focused, full-service, independent agency staffed by a bunch of folks who love what they do and do what they love. Still on the rise after 17 years of success, you'll enjoy a satisfying suite of benefits, as well as the chance to work on the world's most well-know brand.

Will you accept our mission?

Traction is dedicated to creating meaningful advertising, branding, and experiences for our clients and their consumers. In order to accomplish this, we have fostered a culture rooted in autonomy, empowerment, collaboration, and\xe2\x80\x94occasionally\xe2\x80\x94mischief. We believe that great work is spontaneous, and the best ideas come from a diverse team of creatively-minded individuals. Our goal is to be an agency where the journey getting there is as great as the work itself, and we're looking for the right people to help us do it.

title: b'Web Developer (mid-level)'
job description:
b"The Challenge

We are bringing the cloud to Adobe's desktop products. We use React.js to build integrations with core web services in all of Adobe's desktop apps like Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, Premiere and more. If you are a senior Javascript developer with solid CS fundamentals and also enjoy getting your hands dirty in places other than the client-side code, this is the role for you. Join our downtown San Francisco-based team and help us bring Adobe into a new age, and improve the lives of creative people around the world!

What You'll Do
Design, code and implement components & UI with React.js
Design, implement, test, profile, release, and optimize the highest quality software experiences using HTML, CSS, & JavaScript
Partner with designers and product managers to provide a best-in-class customer experience

What You'll Need To Succeed
Strong computer science fundamentals
2-3+ years of development experience with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
1+ yr of React.js experience
Experience with code bases, utilizing API design techniques to help keep code clean and maintainable
Comfortable with the Agile development process
Experience with various UI toolkits and interaction models including responsive design
Understanding of supporting APIs, cache layers
BA/BS in computer science, or equivalent work experience
Superb communication skills

At Adobe, you will be immersed in an exceptional work environment that is recognized throughout the world on Best Companies lists. You will also be surrounded by colleagues who are committed to helping each other grow through our unique Check-In approach where ongoing feedback flows freely.

If you\xe2\x80\x99re looking to make an impact, Adobe's the place for you. Discover what our employees are saying about their career experiences on the Adobe Life blog and explore the meaningful benefits we offer.

Adobe is an equal opportunity employer. We welcome and encourage diversity in the workplace regardless of race, gender, religion, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or veteran status."

title: b'Innovation Application Developer'
job description:
b'Blue Shield of California is seeking Innovation Application Developer for the Health Innovation Team. This role part of an agile development team tasked with successfully building disruptive new prototypes. This position will include developing and testing architectures, suggesting tools and frameworks, informing best practices, and producing working prototypes rapidly developed using agile development practices. This is a highly visible role allowing you to share your knowledge and skills with developers, product owners, and business stakeholders in a highly collaborative environment.
 
Core Competencies:
 
You are passionate about building and iterating on software prototypes, thrive in an R&D environment, and have a startup mentality.
 
You may also enjoy building custom algorithms, digging into data for insights, building engaging interfaces and always looking to sharpen your skills with emerging technology or participating in hackathons and meetups.
 
Working to design and implement software solutions to solve highly complex problems.
 
Experience with heads down coding time as well as active participation in ideation activities and demonstrations.
 
Experience with data science technologies and/or experience coordinating with data science teams.
  Qualifications
 o 8+ years of experience in building and iterating on software under tight deadlines. Should be an expert full-stack web developer using modern web frameworks such as react and or angular.
 
o Excellent verbal and written communication skills with strong relationship building skills.
 
o You have knowledge of a variety of programming languages to solve a variety of problems from web applications to low-level algorithm development. You are not pigeon holed into one language, you know how to choose the best tool for the job.
 
o You want to be part of a collaborative innovation lab exploring emerging technologies including machine learning, artificial intelligence, blockchain, mobile development and much more. You are an expert software developer and a jack of all other trades. Most importantly you love to LEARN.

 Nice to have:

 Experience with AI/ML tools and frameworks such as tensorflow, numpy, Python, R, Scala, PyTorch, Pandas, SciKit-learn, etc..

Education:

\xe2\x80\xa2 Bachelor\xe2\x80\x99s degree, Computer Science or a related field or equivalent work experience.
 '

title: b'Web Developer'
job description:
b'Overview

Milestone Technologies Inc. is a leading Managed Services solutions provider headquartered in the Bay Area and serving clients globally. Our unique approach to IT Managed Services includes Contact Center, Service Desk, Network Operations, Data Center Operations and Cyber Security Services. Milestone is looking for passionate and motivated professionals who go above and beyond to solve the world\xe2\x80\x99s biggest problems through innovation and technology. Our vision is to revolutionize the way technology is deployed and supported worldwide.

Responsibilities

As a Web Developer, responsibilities include:
Build web pages for internal and external users using HTML and CSS
Partner with broader web developer and engineering teams to propose, ideate and test new capabilities
Create and maintain unit test for new code and defect fixes
Create well designed, testable, efficient HTML/CSS/XML, determine technical requirements, and solving code problems
Upgrade site content and graphics, monitor performance and results, identify and evaluate improvement options, introduce creative solutions, and tag pages properly with taxonomy
Partner with Marketing and Design Leads to manage multiple bodies of work and align against business goals and audience
Clearly communicate with all stakeholders while recognizing potential risks and opportunities to obtain the best results
Ensure deliverables meet functional and design specifications and requirements, in an environment where priorities often compete
Develops and QA site layout by clarifying goals, deigning functionality, categorizing content, funneling traffic through content

Qualifications
BA/BS degree (preferred)
3+ years of experience in web development using PHP, HTML/XML, and CSS
Front End experience (e.g. JavaScript, HTML5, jQuery, CSS, ReactJS)
A solid track record of building elegant and sophisticated web applications that user love to use
Strong organizational skills, planning, take ownership and high level of attention to detail
Understands architecture for apps that integrate into existing systems and explores alternatives
Able to handle the pace and ambiguity that comes with working in a start-up environment
Collaborates in a cross-functional environment and prioritize work against deadlines
Open and able to smartly adapt to real-time feedback
Able to execute independently with minimal supervision

title: b'Web Application Developer, Engineering Data'
job description:
b'We are looking for a highly skilled Full Stack Developer to support our vehicle design, manufacturing and data analytics team. This engineer will build tools/services and web applications to analyze + visualize engineering, production and fleet data. The ideal candidate is comfortable with both front and back end programming. He or she will be responsible for designing and developing client side architecture, user interaction, and databases. This engineer will own projects from conception to completion.

Responsibilities
Design and develop web apps to analyze and visualize engineering, production and fleet data
Maintain and improve existing web apps to support Vehicle Engineering team
Create servers and databases to manage engineering, production and fleet data

Requirements
Proficiency with front end languages: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, etc.
Familiarity with JavaScript frameworks: React, Vue, Angular, etc.
Familiarity with database technologies: MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, etc.
Proficiency with server side languages: Python, Ruby, Java, or PHP.
Experience in developing data visualization front end

Desirable Qualifications
Degree in Computer Science
Familiarity with web-based 3D visualization using WebGL and three.js
Familiarity with JIRA REST API
Appetite to expand disciplines and/or work with the Data Science team
Knowledge and experience in statistical and data mining techniques: PCA, GLM/Regression, Random Forest, Boosting, etc.
Experience using statistical computer languages (R, Python, etc.) to manipulate data and draw insights from large data sets
Knowledge of 3D CAD / PLM systems such as CATIA
Knowledge of a variety of machine learning techniques (clustering, decision tree learning, artificial neural networks, etc.) and their real-world advantages/drawbacks'

title: b'Lead Web Developer'
job description:
b"Help shape the future of the fast-growing team that builds Asana.com. We work with designers, marketers, sales folks, and product engineers to make the pre-signup and logged-out experiences of Asana beautiful, delightful, relevant, and compelling, and we\xe2\x80\x99re looking for a technical lead to help us evolve the platform & infrastructure that powers our public site.

Our ideal candidate is empathetic to the developer and content editing experience, and loves empowering teammates and stakeholders with the build, testing, content editing, and digital asset management systems and tools they need to do their best work.

What You\xe2\x80\x99ll Achieve
Work with the web development team to ship releases of asana.com to production
Own and improve our CI setup and automated testing tooling
Lead work to migrate and future-proof asana.com\xe2\x80\x99s stack
Mentor and empower your teammates to grow technically


About You
You have 7+ years of experience building and releasing websites or web apps as part of a technical team.
You have been the technical lead for a large and successful site or platform migration.
You have strong front-end development skills, plus a background in frontend build tooling, continuous integration, regression testing, and deployment pipelines.
You have experience solving technical challenges related to internationalization.
Ideally you have some experience working with Docker, AWS Elastic Beanstalk, other AWS services, content management systems, and/or digital asset management systems.
You have previously mentored engineers or developers.
You\xe2\x80\x99re great at communicating about your work in a way that both technical and non-technical stakeholders find easy to understand.
You\xe2\x80\x99re curious and thoughtful. You see work as a place to grow and learn.


About Us

sana helps teams orchestrate their work, from small projects to strategic initiatives. More than 75,000 organizations and millions of users rely on Asana, including AirAsia, AllBirds, Grab, KLM Air France, Kohl\xe2\x80\x99s, Sephora, Traveloka, and Viessmann. Asana has been named a Top 5 Best Workplace and the #1 Best Workplace in the Bay Area by Fortune three years in a row, and one of Glassdoor\xe2\x80\x99s and Inc.\xe2\x80\x99s Best Places to Work. With nine global offices, including a San Francisco headquarters and flagship offices in Dublin, New York, Sydney, and Tokyo, Asana is always looking for curious, collaborative, and mission-driven people to help us enable the world\xe2\x80\x99s teams to work together effortlessly.

Our goal is to ensure that Asana upholds an inclusive environment where all people feel that they are equally respected and valued, whether they are applying for an open position or working at the company. We welcome applicants of any educational background, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, religion, ethnicity, age, citizenship, socioeconomic status, disability, and veteran status, and we'd love to learn about what you can add to our team."

title: b'Web Developer'
job description:
b"Location: Palo Alto, CA

With more than 117 years of technology innovation, a global team of 100,000, and 64,000+ technology patents, NEC is in the business of providing solutions that focus on safety, security, operational efficiency - enabling people to live brighter, more enriched lives. We call this orchestrating a brighter world.

Summary

Provide programming and troubleshooting support for Marketing-related web activities. Must be able to design, define, evaluate and implement a range of third-party and proprietary web-based & hardware accelerator applications as well as maintain, revise and upgrade propriety web-based & hardware accelerator legacy applications and workflows. Conceptual knowledge and practical experience in the phases of web programming, maintenance, security, and development essential.

Able to collaborate with others, deliver results in a timely manner and explain best practices and concepts in a way that builds consensus and wins alliances.

Essential Duties And Responsibilities
45% Analyze, evaluate, develop, test and deploy new and existing web-based & hardware accelerator applications.
Provides detailed analysis to ensure applications meet key requirements.
Design software applications, modules and/or approaches and required enhancements for operational efficiencies.
Codes, reviews, prepare prototypes to demonstrate effectiveness.
Analyzes, recommends, validates and implements software application rebuilds and upgrades.
20% Interpret web-based marketing needs, assess requirements and identify solutions to standard and non-standard requests to establish and maintain a positive NEC brand image with customers, prospects, media and analysts, employees and the general public.
Collaborates internally/externally to determine web-based requirements and identify best practices to achieve key objectives and outcomes.
Explains issues and works to build understanding and consensus.
20% Maintains and enhances technology expertise, keeping current with evolving systems analysis, programming and database technology.
10% Produces program, system and user documentation for all systems created within the department.
5% Provides on-call support for customers 24x7.

Prerequisites
Education: Bachelor's degree in business, computer science or equivalent work experience.
Experience:
2+ years of experience in Web Development.
2+ years experience developing .net, PHP or other programming applications.
2+ years of experience with Microsoft SQL.
Familiar with CMS tools such as Autonomy Teamsite.
HTML5, CCS3, JavaScript, XML, Web Services, API.
Microsoft SQL stored procedures, views, indexes.
Familiarity with SAP.


Specialized Knowledge And Skills
Language Skills: Excellent communication skills and a demonstrated ability to effectively work with and support customers.
Mathematical Skills: Must be skilled in basic math.
Reasoning Skills: Must be able to work with limited oversight. Must be self-motivated with strong attention to detail.
Computer and/or Technical Skills: Possesses in-depth working knowledge of programming and systems analysis procedures. Is fluent in the relevant programming languages and environments. Proficient in all aspects of the software development lifecycle (including analysis, design, development, testing, implementation, and support).

Work Environment and Physical Demands
General Work Environment: Professional office environment.
Noise: Moderate.
Standing/Lifting: None.
Visual: Must be able to read small text accurately.
Stress: Medium. Must be able to work independently with limited guidance.
Travel: Moderate.
Supervisory Responsibility, if any: This position has no supervisory responsibilities.


About Nec Corporation Of America

Headquartered in Irving, Texas, NEC is a leading provider of innovative IT, biometrics, network, and communications products and solutions for service carriers and Fortune 1000 and SMB businesses across multiple vertical industries, including healthcare, government, education, and hospitality. NEC delivers one of the industry's broadest portfolios of technology solutions and professional services, including unified communications, wireless, voice and data, managed services, server and storage infrastructure, optical network systems, microwave radio communications, and biometric security. NEC is a wholly owned subsidiary of NEC Corporation, a global technology leader with a presence in over 44 countries and more than $37.5 billion in revenue. For more information, please visit www.necam.com.

NEC Corporation of America and its subsidiaries is committed to the maximum utilization of all human resources and the goal of Equal Employment Opportunity/Affirmative Action. We provide equal opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, age, marital status, disability, genetic characteristics, height, weight, arrest record pertaining to misdemeanors or status as a Vietnam era or special disabled veteran, or any other class protected by applicable federal, state or local laws.

EOE-Minorities/Females/Protected Veterans/Individuals with Disabilities."

title: b'Web Production Developer'
job description:
b'Summary

Apple Retail is seeking an experienced web production developer to join the Apple Digital Content Management team.

You are smart, self-directed, and a problem-solver. You thrive under pressure and deadlines while being at ease dealing with ambiguity and rapidly changing requirements. You have ultimate respect for pixel perfect UI implementation.

Key Qualifications

Minimum 3 years of experience in developing front-end code for large-scale websites
Solid understanding of cross-browser, cross-platform and cross-device compatibility standards and behaviors
Strong HTML and CSS skills. Experience in JavaScript, Node, DevOps and scripting languages (Ruby, PHP, Python, etc) is a plus
Experience with versions control systems, specifically Git
Knowledgeable and eager to implement current web design and development trends including HTML5, CSS3
Must be a quick study, our team uses some proprietary technologies beyond HTML & CSS
Experience and proficiency working with Photoshop and Sketch
Exhibit a high degree of ownership and accountability
Understanding of challenges behind localization of large-scale sites and its impact on web development
Strong teamwork and communication skills
Great attention to detail
Passion for creating a great user experience and interaction

Description

Create and maintain documentation of the development processes and workflows

Willing and able to accommodate flexible work schedules during critical business periods'

title: b'Web Developer'
job description:
b"Who We Are

Postmates enables anyone to have just about anything on-demand. We pioneered the on-demand space and currently serve 3500+ cities with a fleet of more than 350,000 Postmates and the largest network of merchants in the US. We\xe2\x80\x99re changing the landscape of commerce by making cities our warehouses, providing the delivery infrastructure, and connecting our customers to any product, anywhere, anytime. Postmates isn\xe2\x80\x99t just an app, it\xe2\x80\x99s a way of life and a part of pop culture. We are the O.G. of on-demand and we\xe2\x80\x99ve given people a new superpower \xe2\x80\x94 the ability to Postmate anything from anywhere. We\xe2\x80\x99re building a movement to make Postmates a verb: Postmate it.

What We Do

Postmates relies heavily on our engineering team to realize this vision. Building a software platform that is reliable, scales, and stays agile under demanding product needs is a serious technical challenge. Postmates is a three-part balancing act connecting customers, merchants, and couriers in real-time. If any piece is out of whack, the whole system suffers. Working with the Postmates engineering team offers an opportunity with explosive growth, cutting-edge technology, a highly visible charter, and a cool user-focused product vision.

Postmates is looking for a contract Web Developer who would primarily focus on our SEO initiatives. The role would mostly be building static/light on javascript marketing type pages. Since most of our tooling and apps are written in React though, it is important to have some familiarity with React.
OUR TECHNOLOGIES
Client: Typescript, React, Redux, Emotion
Server: Go, Python, Node
Platform: AWS, Google
YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES
Build and launch consumer-facing features to millions of customers
Tune and polish features to a high-degree of excellence
Work closely with the design and product team to iterate on UI/UX
Relentlessly optimize the web experience of buying with Postmates
OUR REQUIREMENTS
Minimum of 2 years of experience working with web technologies and a passion for UX
Minimum of 2 years of experience working with a modern web framework like React or Angular
A deep understanding of the fundamentals of the web (REST, JS, HTML, CSS)
Strong knowledge of algorithms and data structures
Bachelor's degree (or equivalent experience) required
OUR PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS
You\xe2\x80\x99re a self-starter and strong finisher
You\xe2\x80\x99ve worked at or started a small company where you had to wear many hats
You write well and communicate clearly
You prefer problems over tasks"

title: b'Web Developer'
job description:
b"TL;DR

High-impact software development jobs for smart people.

Code that saves lives.

As a software developer at Epic, you\xe2\x80\x99ll write software that impacts the lives of 75% of Americans and 250 million patients around the world. Working in your own office, surrounded by thousands of high-caliber developers, you\xe2\x80\x99ll use modern development methodologies and employ user-centered design, analytics, and machine learning tools to drive innovation in healthcare. Using leading-edge technologies and languages like JS, TS, and C#, you\xe2\x80\x99ll invent better ways to reduce medical errors, streamline record sharing between hospitals, and provide the quality of care a patient deserves.

Write software for the most innovative health systems on the planet.

All the Top 20 health systems in U.S. News and World Report are Epic customers. Our community includes major systems like the Mayo Clinic, Johns Hopkins, Cleveland Clinic, and Kaiser Permanente, as well as leading academic medical centers at the University of Wisconsin, University of Michigan, University of California, University of Texas, The Ohio State University, and many more.

Work in your own office, eat delicious food, and travel the world.

We don\xe2\x80\x99t believe in cubicles. (Well, we believe they exist, but\xe2\x80\xa6) You will work in an individual office that will heighten your ability to get stuff done. For lunch, visit King\xe2\x80\x99s Cross or Cassiopeia for a wide array of meal options, or go to one of our smaller, themed bistros, featuring wood-rotisserie, pan-Asian, and Latin-inspired cuisine. All meals are restaurant-quality but cost only a few dollars, and they\xe2\x80\x99re prepared by a team comprised of kitchen talent from restaurants around the country. And, after five years here, you\xe2\x80\x99ll earn a four-week sabbatical anywhere in the world. Staff have kayaked in Patagonia, attended a Beyonc\xc3\xa9 concert in Ireland, built a library in Tanzania, and run a marathon in Antarctica.

Live affordably in a city known for its rising tech talent.

Epic is located just outside Madison, Wisconsin the second fastest growing market for tech talent in the United States and home to the state capital and the University of Wisconsin. Madison, a city surrounded by water, has received accolades for being the greenest city in America (NerdWallet), the best city for renters (SmartAsset), fittest city in America (Fitbit), and, for the gamers, is one of a handful of US cities to have a Killer Queen arcade game, located at Madison\xe2\x80\x99s first arcade bar.

More than just important work.

We offer comprehensive benefits to keep you healthy and happy as you grow in your life and career, and your merit-based compensation will reflect the impact your work has on the company and our customers. You'll also be eligible for annual raises and bonuses, as well as stock grants, which give you an even greater stake in the success of Epic and our customers. Epic is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action (W/M/Vets/Disability) employer. Please see our full non-discrimination statement at https //careers.epic.com/EEO.

Requirements

Open to relocation to the Madison, WI area (we will bring you here to explore the city for yourself)
BS/BA or greater in Computer Science, Mathematics, Software Engineering, Computer Engineering, or a related field
A history of academic excellence or professional success
Eligible to work in the United States without visa sponsorship (persons with appropriate qualifications and eligible for TN status under NAFTA may apply)"

title: b'Web Developer'
job description:

Our comprehensive suite of applications help clients deliver memorable, digital-first customer experiences in an omnichannel world. To find out more about eGain, visit https://www.egain.com.

title: b'Web Application Developer'
job description:

title: b'Web Developer'
job description:
b"About Rippling

Rippling is the first way for businesses to manage their HR & IT \xe2\x80\x94 from payroll and benefits, to employee computers and apps \xe2\x80\x94 all in one, modern system.

In just 90-seconds, a company can set up (or disable) an employee's payroll, health insurance, work computer, and third-party apps, like Gmail, Microsoft Office, and Slack. It's the only platform that truly unifies every employee system, and automates all of the administrative work.

Rippling is HQ in San Francisco and has raised $60M in Series A funding from top-tier investors, including Kleiner Perkins, Initialized, DFJ, and Y Combinator.

About The Role

We are looking for a Web Developer to join our fast-paced team and take ownership of and set the standard for the front-end code of our website and all digital marketing assets. You must be comfortable working at the intersection of rough mockups and backend APIs, implementing interfaces in a crisp and precise way in both web and mobile. You will need to debug JavaScript, hack CSS, and have full accountability and understanding for how pages/UIs operate in the web and mobile environments.

What You'll Do
Work directly with the marketing team to develop page layouts, templates, dynamic navigations
Develop interactive user experiences
Develop animation for web and mobile web digital products


Qualifications
Fluent in JavaScript, HTML/CSS, Web API, and other UI technologies and frameworks
Knowledge of web hosting principles, server architectures, and web site security
Experience at a B2B SaaS company working with AdTech or MarTech a plus
Wordpress experience is a plus
Working knowledge of fundamental design principles that affect typography, color use, composition, use of space, and presentation of information
Back-end development experience desired, but not required
Ability in a design tool for quick mockups (preferably Photoshop, Illustrator, Sketch) a plus


Benefits
Medical, Dental, Vision, FSA, HSA, Commuter, Life and Disability Benefits
Uncapped PTO
Meeting-light culture
Onsite meals
Competitive compensation (salary, equity)


Rippling is an equal opportunity employer."

title: b'Web Developer (Contract Position)'
job description:
b'Web Developer (Contract Position)

Five9 is a 250 million dollar leader in cloud based contact center solutions and one of the Bay Area\xe2\x80\x99s fastest growing companies. Since 2001, Five9 has led the cloud revolution in contact centers, helping organizations transition from legacy premise-based solutions to the cloud. Five9 provides businesses with cloud contact center software that is reliable, secure, compliant and scalable, which is designed to create exceptional customer experiences, increase agent productivity and deliver tangible business results.

The Five9 Digital Marketing team is looking for a contract Web Developer (mid-level) to join us in shaping the future Five9.com and taking our digital presence to another level.

The Web Producer is responsible for the development, production, and maintenance of Five9.com webpages. In collaboration with the Marketing team, the Web Producer will support the strategic plan and development of the Five9.com website, and contribute to the day-to-day production of content for the website.

This position is not remote and will require someone to be in our San Francisco office. This is a 3 month contract.

What your day-to-day responsibilities look like:

Build out web pages and landing pages while coordinating with the marketing team for images, copy, creative, and content page attributes.
Execute QA (quality assurance) and QC (quality control) of webpages to ensure the content is coherent and accurate.
Review content edits and requests from stakeholders in a timely fashion, and publish as appropriate.
Work with a highly collaborative, engaged, and effective group.
Help explore innovative, relevant, and highly effective digital experiences and solutions for site enhancements to improve the customer experience.

What are the skills we\xe2\x80\x99re looking for?

5+ years related experience developing semantically correct HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Experience in creating landing pages, content web pages.
Strong interpersonal and communication skills.
Familiarity with website best practices in web development to protect secure information.
Familiarity in responsive design for mobile-compatible websites and tools.
Strong writing and editing skills.
Must be a self-starter, highly motivated, awesome organizational skills, with the ability to turn on a dime, think through problems to come up with innovative solutions and deliver against very tight deadlines while keeping a keen eye on detail and accuracy. Energetic, resourceful, driven, creative.
A plus, familiarity with content management systems (CMS) like Crownpeak.
A plus, you have worked closely and have a general understanding of information architecture, user experience, interaction design, visual design initiatives.
Degree in Design, Art, CS or proven equivalent.

What\xe2\x80\x99s the team like?

Small but mighty! We\xe2\x80\x99re a collaborative, thoughtful, and experienced digital marketing team within a fast paced culture. Always learning, communicating, and having fun along the way.'

title: b'Front End Developer'
job description:
b'As a Front-end developer within the Human Interaction Engineering (HIE) team, you will work closely with UI designers, graphic designers, software engineers and QA engineers for creating interactive web applications using a range of technologies (like HTML5, JavaScript, ReactJS, CSS, XML/JSON).

Strong experience with JavaScript and CSS libraries and frameworks such as React and Bootstrap \xe2\x80\x93 including in-depth knowledge of DOM, cross-browser support, and customization
Experience in using and customizing JavaScript libraries and writing efficient and reusable UI code

Experience in version one product design a big plus
Excellent communication and teamwork skills

Trend Micro provides equal employment opportunity for all applicants and employees. Trend Micro does not unlawfully discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, pregnancy and childbirth or related medical conditions, national origin, ancestry, age, physical or mental disability, medical condition, family care leave status, veteran status, marital status, sexual orientation, or gender identity.'

job description:
